EmailTemplate.name: AESS 350.
EmailTemplate.subject: A350 AESU EGPWM Terrain Database Release Notification version 585
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}
Honeywell has just released Service Information Letter D201610000018 detailing a new worldwide Airbus A350 AESU EGPWM Terrain Database - version 582. This version is an update to previous version 581 and adds a number of new airports, runways and obstacles while improving terrain mapping and resolution.
The database and supporting documentation (Service Information Letter and a Certificate of Conformance) can be downloaded by visiting ads.honeywell.com <[[https://ads.honeywell.com/]]> (login required). EGPWS database search tools and change info are located there (no login required), look under the Search tab and the Change Info tab.
Please click here <[[mailto:dsa@honeywell.com?subject=EGPWM A350 Query contact us]]> if you have any technical questions concerning the database.
The URL www.egpws.com <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/pages/enhanced-ground-proximity-warning-system]]> will take you directly to the new Honeywell EGPWS page. From there you can view product Information, or jump to the EGPWS Technical Data Site <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/wps/myportal/aero/new_egpws]]> (login required) or the Aerospace Software and Database Services site <[[https://ads.honeywell.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRoju6vPZKXonjHpfsX76%2B0sWaC0lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4CSMBgI%2BSLDwEYGJlv6SgFTLTEMbFpwrgEWhM%3D]]>. We encourage you to visit the website today and explore.
Please click here <[[mailto:myaerospaceportalissue@honeywell.com?subject=EGPWM A350 Website Query contact us]]> if you have any questions concerning operation or access to Honeywell websites.
Best regards,
The Honeywell EGPWS Team This email was sent by: Honeywell 21111 N 19th Avenue Phoenix, AZ 85027 USA View Terms & Conditions <[[http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx]]> View Our Privacy Statement <[[http://honeywell.com/privacy/pages/en.aspx]]>
